General.Name: Akobo Minerals AB (publ)
General.Description: Akobo Minerals AB (publ) operates as a gold exploration and mining company. It holds interest in the Akobo project covering an area of approximately 182 square kilometers located along the Akobo river in southwestern Ethiopia. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

5.Name: Tesfaye  Medhane
5.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Etno Mining Ltd
